Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone connecting two students to show a way to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate how the string telephone uses sound to send messages between the students.
The student can incorporate specific features such as cups (or similar devices) and string to represent how sound travels through the telephone.
The student can demonstrate how the drawn string telephone enables communication without electricity or electronic devices.
The student can depict an example of how this technology makes life easier or solves a problem of long-distance communication.
